1.text: Preheat the oven to 400 °F (204 °C) on a regular bake setting.

2.text: Scrub and wash the sweet potatoes.
2.vid: /d/dd/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Pierce each sweet potato several times with a fork.
3.vid: /3/3a/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Place the sweet potatoes on a lined oven tray.
4.vid: /a/a5/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Bake the sweet potatoes for 45 minutes.
5.vid: /b/b0/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Top the sweet potatoes with butter, salt, and pepper.

8.text: Wash and scrub the sweet potatoes.
8.vid: /1/19/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Cut the sweet potatoes in half lengthwise.
9.vid: /0/08/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Slice each sweet potato half into 4 long strips.
10.vid: /b/b9/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 10 Version 3.360p.mp4

11.text: Chop each slice into 0.5 in (1.3 cm) cubes.
11.vid: /c/c7/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.text: Spread the sweet potato pieces out on a lined oven tray.
12.vid: /9/95/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 12 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.text: Coat the sweet potato pieces with oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
13.vid: /6/6a/Cook a Sweet Potato in the Oven Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4

14.text: Bake the sweet potato pieces at 400 °F (204 °C) for 25-30 minutes.
